title: LEM Barstool Red
body: Named Product of the Year at the FX International Interior Design Awards in the year 2000, this Mobelaris style of the LEM Barstool reveals an original rethinking of the form and function of seating. Its minimalistic yet elegant design gives the feeling of absence of gravity, a masterpiece of lightness and elegance. Suits well whether at home or at a commercial setting, this Mobelaris style of the LEM Barstool meets all the requirements for a comfortable and artistic environment.
